title: Doomsday Diaries III: Luke the Protector
description: Devastated by the loss of yet another loved one, Luke embraces his destiny as he realizes his true power as a Protector. As he continues guiding and protecting Grant and the others from the dark and powerful Winthrop, Luke must come to terms with the paradigm shift within himself. As Luke accepts his fate, his calling is realized, but will he be able to escape the clutches of the New World Order and save humankind?
author: Aaron B. Powell
